name: Sophitia
title: The Holy Warrior
subtitle: A divine warrior who combines holy power with sword and shield techniques
lore: A chosen warrior blessed by the gods, Sophitia wields her divine powers to protect the innocent. Her mastery of sword and shield, combined with her holy blessings, makes her a formidable defender. Despite her gentle nature, she fights with unwavering determination to maintain the balance between the mortal and divine realms.

passive.name: Divine Blessing
passive.description:
Sophitia gains bonuses based on her current HP:
100-95% HP: +2/4/8/12/18 AD
94%-80% HP: +3/4/5/6/8 Mana regen/s
79%-50% HP: Reduces crowd control time by 0.2/0.3/0.35/0.5/0.7 seconds

Q.name: Holy Strike
Q.description: Sophitia swings her sword twice in front of her. Each hit deals [45/100/165/275/350 + 40% AD] damage. If the target is affected by the bleed from her W ability, Sophitia heals for [40%] of the damage dealt and refreshes the bleed duration.

W.name: Sting
W.description: Sophitia stabs a nearby enemy with her sword, immediately slowing them by [60%] for [3.5s] and dealing [10/14/20/28/33] damage every [0.5s] during the slow.

E.name: Shield of Faith
E.description: Sophitia raises her shield in a defensive stance, creating a large protective wall in front of her that absorbs all incoming damage for [3s]. When the wall expires, it sends out a wave that stuns all enemies in front of her for [0.6s]. Expiration can be earlier if the ability is pressed again. During this ability, Sophitia cannot use her Q and W abilities.

R.name: Prayer
R.description: Sophitia's HP regeneration increases to [200/340/500] per second for [5s].

1.name: Holy Warrior
1.description: Increase the bonuses from Sophitia's passive by 15%. Additionally, her attack speed increases by 0.1 when her health is above 95%.

1.name: Divine Strike
1.description: Sophitia's Q ability now also reduces the cooldown of her W by 1 second per hit. Additionally, hitting an enemy with Q restores 5% of her maximum mana.

1.name: Guardian's Path
1.description: Sophitia's E ability also grants a shield to nearby allies and herself, absorbing 20% of the damage she absorbs for [2s].

5.name: Aegis Mastery
5.description: Reduces the cooldown of E by 3 seconds and increases the duration of the defensive wall by 1 second.

5.name: Valorous Might
5.description: Increases Sophitia's basic attack damage by 15% and grants 5% lifesteal.

5.name: Blessed Recovery
5.description: Increases the effectiveness of healing received by 25% when Sophitia's health is below 35%.

10.name: Divine Endurance
10.description: Increases the duration of Sophitia's R ability by 2 seconds and grants her 30% damage reduction while it is active.

10.name: Sacred Renewal
10.description: While R is active, Sophitia radiates an aura that heals nearby allies for 15% of the healing she receives from her R.

15.name: Sharp Edge
15.description: Sophitia's Q ability now causes enemies to bleed for an additional 50% of the damage dealt.

15.name: Persistent Will
15.description: Reduces the cooldown of all abilities by 0.5 second every time Sophitia hits an enemy with her basic attacks.

15.name: Blessing of Athena
15.description: Using any ability grants Sophitia a shield that absorbs damage equal to 5% of her maximum health for 5 seconds.

20.name: Divine Intervention
20.description: When Sophitia falls below 14% health, she becomes immune to spells for 2 seconds. This effect has a 120-second cooldown.

20.name: Retribution Strike
20.description: Sophitia's Q now strikes three times instead of two and the healing from the bleed effect is increased to 65% of the damage dealt.

20.name: Sanctified Barrier
20.description: Defensive Wall reflecting the negated damage to the attacker by [5%] of the negated damage.

20.name: Celestial Empowerment
20.description:
All of Sophitia's abilities gain an additional effect:
Q: Hitting an enemy reduces their armor by 3% for 3 seconds.
W: The slow and bleed effect lasts an additional 1 second.
E: Sophitia is immune to CC while holding the shield.

weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
Requires good timing of defensive abilities
